ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] RE:  Monk Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a couple good guides on the Monkly Business message board, and one elsewhere, about getting your shackle of steel.  Here s a couple links..  If the
ygData.messageBody:
There's a couple good guides on the Monkly Business message board, and one elsewhere, about getting your shackle of steel.  Here's a couple links..  If the links get seperated because they're too long, just reconnect them :)
 
http://pub28.ezboard.com/fmonklybusiness43508frm7.showMessage?topicID=1265.topic
 
http://www.geocities.com/sstair/Monk/ShackleofSteel.html
 
If you need info about other shackles, www.monkly-business.com has that in the quest guide section.
Btw, you need to turn in bronze in the series of quests, so plan on doing it again if you want nice magic resistance :)
Copper stinks anyway, but at least Kwinn is a pretty quick spawn now.  Most get him within 2 hours.
Fenedar
Innoruuk

Great reply, thanks for the info on shackle of steel, could you post a
breakdown of the quest, I am gonna be starting this failry soon, maybe I can
begin collecting whatever items are needed now.  I think the stell shackle
will be a perfect compliment ot my items, and I have a new found
appreciation for Magic resistance since I obtained my bronze shackle.  Stats
are great on the Steel one though.

Any info you can provide to easy my quest would be appreciated.



I was in my mid twenties when I finished the shackle of Bronze quest.


Indicus Velox
35 rank SwiftTail Caste
Saryrn
